Игра представляет собой состязание 4vs1 на небольших картах, где вам придётся завести до 5(зависит от количества живых выживших) генераторов или же найти люк появляющийся после выполнения некоторых целей, чтобы спастись-
за все это вы получаете очки,с помощью которых вы можете прокачивать этих выживших или маньяков и открывать для них новые предметы и улучшения к ним,которые помогут вам в выполнении целей и дальнейшем выживании(или же кровавой охоте).
Тимплей в этой игре приветствуется, потому что у разных выживших(персонажей) есть эксклюзивные пассивные и активные навыки, которые часто можно комбинировать.
За убийц из различных фильмов ужасов вам необходимо всячески препятствовать действиям выживших:ломать генераторы, выслеживать жертв и вешать их на крюки.
Единственный негативный момент что я обнаружил - это ужасный дизбаланс в сторону маньяков из за содержащихся в DLC  имболансных убийц и их навыков, тк за них нужно приложить минимальные усилия чтобы выйграть-грубо говоря это pay2win механика и это огорчает.
Графика слабоватая(привет пиксельным генераторам), но сносная и гарантирует стабильный игровой процесс на средних пк.
Карт вроде бы и много, но в основном это какие нибудь однообразные леса, поля и болота, а по настоящему запоминающиеся можно пересчитать по пальцам.
У большинства убийц на уровнях есть свои музыкальные темы, но затмить заглавную играющую в меню им не удаётся.
Игра может затянуть как на пару вечеров,так и на 50+ часов в зависимости от того пробовали ли вы раньше данный жанр. Советую брать на скидках если у вас есть хотя бы один друг с которым вы сможете в неё сыграть.
Really fun but community is toxic af.

이 게임이 원하던 살인마 / 생존자 모두가 서로의 목적을 추구하며 밸런스가 유지되도록 하는 게임이 없어진지는 이미 꽤 오랜 시간이 지났다. 아시아권에서는 흔한 터널링/ 캠핑을 추구하지 못하도록 이 게임 제작자들은 결정적인 일격이라는 흔히 칼찌라 불리는 스킬부터 손을 대기 시작한 것부터가 대다수의 플레이어들에게 사용되어지며 살인마에게 지나치게 언밸런스하게 변했고, 다른 사람(생존자/살인마)과의 게임도 롤과 오버워치로 따지자면 다이아/브론즈 급으로 같이 매칭이 되는 너무나 한쪽으로는 커버하기 힘든 게임이 되어버렸다. 굳이 이 게임을 사라고 말해보고 싶지 않다. 이 게임에 대한 개인의 방송시청시간과 플레이 시간을 총합해본 결과 1~2년 반이라는 시간동안 이미 오래전부터 밸런스가 깨져있고 불편한 버그들과 서비스에도 불구하고 정작 개발자들은 손을 대고자 하는 의지가 안보인다. 왜냐하면 매번 패치때마다 버그들을 수정함에도 불구하고 시기에 따라 보이는 버그들이 엇비슷하고 정작 문제가 될 여지들은 바꿔치기 하기 때문이다. 저번 ASH DLC와 또한 그렇다. 정작 개발자들은 이 상품들을 팔아보고자 많은 상향들을 해주지만 정작 하향시켜야 할 최강의 살인마는 그대로 냅두고 그에도 불구하고 많은 약함을 지닌 살인마들을 오히려 하향시켜버리는 유럽과 북미 서버에 맞춘 아시아 서버에 불리한 게임이면서 막상 물타기를 끝내면 하향시켜버리는 소수편향적인 개발자들의 게임이다. 많은 게임방송 스트리머들 / 유튜버들이 이 게임을 방송하였고 그에 맞춰 게임 개발자들은 늘상 새로움을 추구하고자 다양한 시도를 꾸며보고자 노력하지만 당신들이 높은 랭크에 올라갈수록 단조롭게 나올 살인마들과 고정되어지는 스킬들을 보며 당신에게 이 게임을 사고자 한다면 깊게 파고들지 않는 걸 추천한다.

游戏是好游戏，但是中国没服务器。其次价格相对合理，但是血点常常因为游戏错误（网络错误、无法更新您的段位信息、无网络连接。。。。。。）而无法结算，不是被游戏气死的，也不是被屠夫气死的，而是被游戏的bug气死的

This game is an unbalanced mess. Killers have absolutely no downside to any perk they use. Meanwhile every survivor perk has a catch. Killers who have one hit capability are the fastest movers in the game. This is poor game design. Every time you queue with a friend and the game ends, you have to re invite to play together more. Each lobby consists of brand new players mixed with high level players. For this style of game that just can't be happening. People with no perks cannot win against people who have a full build. Please don't buy this game or support the DLC until they actually balance it.

"Its geared to survivors! Killers need buffs! Look how quick gens get done!"
"Its geared toward killers! Getting camped, or tunneled by a killer with a movement ability that allows to travel halfway across the map!"

Let me lay down the real truth;

The Game Is Broken Everywhere You Look.

Killers get unfair powers, offerings, or equipment.
Survivors get unfair perks, equipment and loops.

You either survive til the end, or survive for only two minutes. You either kill all the survivors, or you get none. Moris, Flashlights, Keys, Killers who teleport, who can outright negate your perks ─ Literally cough cough, Plague versus Iron Will, COUGH COUGH loud enough for her to hear!

Killer mains will still complain. Survivor mains, like myself, will still complain. Because no matter where you look, the game is an unbalanced, buggy, and outright toxic mess. There is no 'get good', either. It won't matter when you either face or team up with players who either Disconnect after their first down/hook, which by the way there's still no penalty for ragequitters.

I put over 400+ hours into this game. But at least I can safely say; I never t-bagged, I never tunneled, I never camped, I never bullied, and I never insulted anyone. I'll only say the developers of this game are incompetent. Don't just mess with the overall "balance" of the game, fix some of the REAL issues that make it infuriating to play.

1. ADD A PENALTY TO RAGEQUITTERS
2. Get real dedicated servers. I see the ones you're currently cooking up as of writing this review, and they're awful!
3. Get rid of brainless insta-win mechanics like Moris and Keys, and do something about the flashlights.
4. And finally ─ ADD A PENALTY TO RAGEQUITTERS

Купил по цене которая стоит без скидок, было сложно, очень сложно.
За маньяка(мана) ищет около трех-двух минут, достаточно быстро.
Есть очень много персонажей, для новичка рекомендую Мэг, есть очень много одежды
чтобы можно было одеть своего выжившего как ты хочешь, разновидность маньяков, они могут напасть в любой момент
очень страшно, когда неожиданно, когда только начал играть были проблемы с таймингами, но потом словил звук
и все проблемы решились! Игра очень крутая и заставляет попотеть! За свои деньги лучше не найдешь!
Обожаю эту игру, всем счастья и здоровья, надеюсь мой отзыв об этой игре кому-то поможет, всем удачных покупок и пока!

Pro :Game feels great, not the prettiest but the gameplay makes up for it. I'd recommend buying this game especially if you have some friends to play with.

Cons : the matchmaking is absolutly disgusting. If you are beginner prepare yourself for a decent amount of frustration. Half the time you are matched with people with 200h+ on the game, making it impossible to win (especially as Killer).
When playing killer, check the profile of the survivor you are against, most are private but if you see one with more than 200h, just leave the lobby, it's not worth the time.

Yes this review will make me look like "the salty noob that can't win a single game", but know position yourself as a beginner, being matched against people knowing every map, character and killer by heart. It is very frustrating to play in these circumstances, you can imagine that.

TL;DR : Gameplay is amazing, matchmaking could be improved, 50% of the game are frustrating, the other half are enjoyable and challenging.
Try selfcaring in a corner once, you will never go back

Минус инфиниты, минус паллеты, минус окна, минус осколок(!!!!111), даже тайминги с фанариком и те крутят как сурвам яйца! Минус подношения на свет и туман для стелсеров, которые явно ошиблись игрой.

Spending a little more time with it, a few things that still stand: PC survivors will probably get salty at you if you do well despite running 3 second chance perks and one "I get to do whatever i want for 60 seconds and you can't do anything about it" perk (decisive), haddonfield still kinda sucks, matchmaking still needs fixing (why is putting red ranks against a rank 17 killer okay, BHVR) and survivors on comms at the least take some learning the game to do any kind of well against. To improve your experience: try to go in with an expectation that you're probably going to lose at least some of your games, try to make it a learning experience rather than getting too upset about losing, and try not to let toxicity tilt you too bad. Immediately type GG and leave the lobby if you really have to. 

There is a learning curve and the community can make it tough, but there is enjoyment to be had if you keep the right mindset about it.

If you're playing survivor: please don't unhook in the killer's face if you don't have Borrowed Time. Please don't. You're getting that poor man killed for a meager amount of bloodpoints. You get more if you safely unhook, really! If the killer just won't leave the hook and is facecamping and slapping the guy on hook, then all that means is you get to do all the gens you want until the guy on the hook is dead and he moves on.

Es IMPOSIBLE recomendar éste juego, es único y no tiene competencia y es solo por eso que la gente lo juega.

Desde el día que salió en el año 2016 hasta hoy (y seguramente por el resto de su existencia) no existió ni existirá un día en que el juego no tenga decenas de errores extremadamente molestos.

Teniendo en cuenta que el codigo del juego seguramente es un .txt de 1 mega es increíble que esté tan roto y que cada vez que "solucionen" una cosa rompan 10; sin duda superaron ampliamente a Bugisoft.

Se dedican a sacar nuevas skins todo el tiempo y hacen plata con eso pero tardan una eternidad en "arreglar" los problemas del juego, y como dije antes en cada update rompen 10 cosas nuevas.

El juego tendría que ser gratis así como todos sus dlc (menos los de licencia) ya que la plata la hacen con la venta de skins que es aparentemente lo único que saben hacer. Venderte un juego con tantos bugs es literalmente una estafa.

Behaviour Interactive: si tienen dignidad (que lo dudo mucho) vendan su juego a una empresa competente.

Un bon jeux, avec le quelle tu peux faire des partie personnalisé avec tes amis en tant que tueur ou survivants avec une ambiance qui est présente. Le seul gros point négatif c'est quand le tueur accroche l'un des survivants et le camp jusqu'à qu'il meut sans que les autres puisse avoir la possibilité de intervenir.
LEL

Análise hoje:
Já foi um jogo bom. Depois dos updates que fizeram nos últimos meses, o jogo simplesmente está IMPOSSÍVEL de jogar. Cheio de bugs, travando, jogabilidade piorou e ficou muito pesado. Não adianta nada querer ficar trazendo mapa e dlc nova se não consertar o que precisa. Não recomendo mais, só se você quiser passar raiva.


Primeira análise, quando comecei a jogar:
Apesar de estar jogando há pouco tempo, é impossível dizer que não tive muita diversão.
Eu recomendo jogar principalmente com amigos, porque infelizmente tem pessoas que não sabem jogar em equipe ou que não seguem regras básicas que trazem a graça da partida (como por exemplo o killer ficar "guardando caixão" no gancho). Não sei se o report é muito eficiente, porque em um dia cai em várias partidas com esses problemas.
Outro ponto negativo é o lag que dá do nada em algumas partidas quando o killer está por perto. Não sei o que ocasiona esse problema, se é servidor ou algo assim, mas é bem ruim.
Enfim, é um jogo bom pra jogar casualmente e é bem legal a temática, ainda mais se você for fã de filmes de terror clássicos.

'high' rank survivors tend to be toxic, but it's fun to play if you just ignore all the people at the end of the game.

If you thought of sticking and hanging people off hooks, well this game is for you! Or possibly you like running away from a savage killer who isn’t really “savage”, due to looping of countless minutes. All joking aside this game is great with its free along with paid DLC being great to add more survivors, and killers to your gameplay. Highly recommend for horror fans as well.
